title: 1 BED 1 BATH APARTMENT ALL UTILTIES PAID IN AURORA, CO (Aurora)
posting_body: 1 BED 1 BATH APARTMENT ALL UTILTIES PAID IN AURORA, CO  (Aurora)
1 bed 1 Bath all utilities paid including electric, water, sewer, gas, heat, trash.
Quiet, rural setting no other homes around.
Walking distance to Aurora Plaza and Hood Commons.
First month payment and security deposit due at signing $500 total.
Ground level unit 2 steps on porch entry.
